import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentMethodScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPeymentMethod] = useState('paypal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod({ paymentMethod })) history.push('/placeorder') } return (

Payment Method

Select Method { setPeymentMethod(e.target.value) }}> { setPeymentMethod(e.target.value) }}>
) } export default PaymentMethodScreen
